education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.info: As a Software Engineer at **Luci Smart Finance**, I led the development and optimization of **front-end** pages for the marketing and waitlist experience using **React** and **Tailwind CSS**, significantly improving performance and accessibility. I collaborated closely with product and design teams to implement **UI/UX** improvements based on *Figma* prototypes and *user feedback* gathered through beta testing. In addition, I integrated **SEO** strategies to enhance organic discoverability and drive conversions. My role also included conducting **code reviews**, maintaining *Git* workflows, and enhancing test coverage to ensure production-grade quality across launches.

links.name: Lucy Money Moves Blog (I help maintain & run)

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.info: At **CAEN IT**, I built and maintained responsive websites and tools for faculty and research groups in the *University of Michigan College of Engineering* using **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript** within **WordPress** environments. I also developed a **Python**-based internal tool that **reduced transcription service costs by 50%** through automated *API*-driven vendor comparisons. My responsibilities included managing *Git* workflows, participating in **agile sprint planning**, conducting **code reviews**, and collaborating with stakeholders to resolve issues and improve usability.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills in Web Development & Design, and get better handson experience with current technologies.

projects.name: Mom & Pop Template Website
projects.description: A template website marketing tool for smaller supply companies.
